short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect HSA/FSA-eligible products on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover HSA/FSA Eligibility Instantly!

Stop guessing and start saving! This FREE Chrome extension automatically scans the products you browse and instantly detects if they’re HSA/FSA-eligible. No more confusion—just simple, automatic reminders to use your tax-free dollars while you shop. Install now and let us do the work for you!
